scripts.start:claim: cross-env NODE_ENV=development REACT_APP_TYPE=CLAIM PUBLIC_URL=/claim craco start
scripts.start:overseas: cross-env NODE_ENV=development REACT_APP_TYPE=OVERSEAS PUBLIC_URL=/trip/overseas craco start
scripts.start:departed: cross-env NODE_ENV=development REACT_APP_TYPE=DEPARTED PUBLIC_URL=/trip/departed craco start
scripts.start:trip: cross-env NODE_ENV=development REACT_APP_TYPE=TRIP PUBLIC_URL=/trip  craco start
scripts.start:partner: cross-env NODE_ENV=development REACT_APP_TYPE=PARTNER PUBLIC_URL=/  craco start
scripts.start:safety: cross-env NODE_ENV=development REACT_APP_TYPE=SAFETY PUBLIC_URL=/safety  craco start
scripts.start:disaster: cross-env NODE_ENV=development REACT_APP_TYPE=DISASTER REACT_APP_DISASTER_APP=safeguard PUBLIC_URL=/safety/disaster  craco start
scripts.start:safeguard: cross-env NODE_ENV=development REACT_APP_TYPE=DISASTER REACT_APP_DISASTER_APP=safeguard PUBLIC_URL=/safety/disasterSafeguard  craco start
scripts.start:house: cross-env NODE_ENV=development REACT_APP_TYPE=DISASTER REACT_APP_DISASTER_APP=house PUBLIC_URL=/safety/disasterHouse  craco start
scripts.start:governance: cross-env NODE_ENV=development REACT_APP_TYPE=DISASTER REACT_APP_DISASTER_APP=governance PUBLIC_URL=/safety/disasterGovernance  craco start
scripts.start:fire: cross-env NODE_ENV=development REACT_APP_TYPE=FIRE PUBLIC_URL=/safety/fire  craco start
scripts.start:longterm: cross-env NODE_ENV=development REACT_APP_TYPE=LONGTERM PUBLIC_URL=/trip/longterm  craco start
scripts.start:domestic: cross-env NODE_ENV=development REACT_APP_TYPE=DOMESTIC PUBLIC_URL=/trip/domestic craco start
scripts.start:home: cross-env NODE_ENV=development REACT_APP_TYPE=HOME PUBLIC_URL=/  craco start
scripts.start:certificate: cross-env NODE_ENV=development REACT_APP_TYPE=CERTIFICATE PUBLIC_URL=/certificate  craco start
scripts.build:claim: rm -rf build && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 NODE_ENV=production GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false REACT_APP_TYPE=CLAIM PUBLIC_URL=/claim craco build && if [ -d 'build/static' ]; then rm -rf /var/www/claim && mkdir -p /var/www/claim && cp -r build/* /var/www/claim/; else echo 'Build failed, not copying files'; exit 1; fi
scripts.build:overseas: rm -rf build && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 NODE_ENV=production GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false REACT_APP_TYPE=OVERSEAS REACT_APP_PRODUCT_CD=15540 PUBLIC_URL=/trip/overseas craco build && if [ -d 'build/static' ]; then rm -rf /var/www/trip/overseas && mkdir -p /var/www/trip/overseas && cp -r build/* /var/www/trip/overseas/; else echo 'Build failed, not copying files'; exit 1; fi
scripts.build:departed: sudo rm -rf build && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 NODE_ENV=production GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false REACT_APP_TYPE=DEPARTED REACT_APP_PRODUCT_CD=15540 PUBLIC_URL=/trip/departed craco build && if [ -d 'build/static' ]; then sudo rm -rf /var/www/trip/departed && sudo mkdir -p /var/www/trip/departed && sudo cp -r build/* /var/www/trip/departed/; else echo 'Build failed, not copying files'; exit 1; fi
scripts.build:trip: echo 'ðŸš€ Starting build for trip and all subpages...' && rm -rf build && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 NODE_ENV=production GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false REACT_APP_TYPE=TRIP PUBLIC_URL=/trip craco build && if [ -d 'build/static' ]; then rm -rf /var/www/trip && mkdir -p /var/www/trip && cp -r build/* /var/www/trip/; else echo 'Build failed, not copying files'; exit 1; fi && echo 'âœ… Trip main completed' && npm run build:overseas && echo 'âœ… Overseas completed' && npm run build:departed && echo 'âœ… Departed completed' && npm run build:longterm && echo 'âœ… Longterm completed' && npm run build:domestic && echo 'âœ… Domestic completed' && echo 'ðŸŽ‰ All trip builds completed successfully!'
scripts.build:longterm: rm -rf build && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 NODE_ENV=production GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false REACT_APP_TYPE=LONGTERM REACT_APP_PRODUCT_CD=15670 PUBLIC_URL=/trip/longterm craco build && if [ -d 'build/static' ]; then rm -rf /var/www/trip/longterm && mkdir -p /var/www/trip/longterm && cp -r build/* /var/www/trip/longterm/; else echo 'Build failed, not copying files'; exit 1; fi

scripts.build:all: rm -rf /var/www/trip /var/www/trip/overseas /var/www/trip/departed /var/www/trip/longterm /var/www/trip/domestic /var/www/claim /var/www/safety /var/www/safety/disaster /var/www/safety/fire /var/www/safety/disasterSafeguard /var/www/safety/disasterHouse /var/www/safety/disasterGovernance /var/www/home /var/www/partner /var/www/certificate && yarn build:home && yarn build:trip && yarn build:overseas && yarn build:departed && yarn build:longterm && yarn build:domestic && yarn build:claim && yarn build:safety && yarn build:safeguard && yarn build:house && yarn build:governance && yarn build:fire && yarn build:partner && yarn build:certificate
